wordpressPost.title: Highasakite will headline Friday 12th of August
wordpressPost.content:
The first time Highasakite played at Øya, they were discovered by Bon Iver’s Justin Vernon, who quickly became a fan. Since then they are drawing bigger crowds abroad every year, and will have a special focus on the international market in 2016.

 

Highasakite – Friday 12th of August

Highasakite just released the first single from the forthcoming third album, Camp Echo. 2014’s Silent Treatment, went to number one in Norway and made the band one the country’s biggest. The album broke the record by spending 94 weeks in the charts.

The band’s unique sound is based on dark, dramatic and electronic pop, which sounds vulnerable and big at the same time. Highasakite’s growing interest from abroad will make them spend a lot of 2016 on the road, around the world.

The Line Of Best Fit about the previous album: – Silent Treatment animates melodic pop songs and paints a Björk-dipped-in-Cocteau Twins fantasia of iridescent synths, yet one always shunted along by powerful, clashing drums.

http://www.highasakite.no/

www.highasakite.no

photo: Lasse Fløde

messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
